bow: when did you feel back to your pre pregnant self its been five weeks since had my son stretch marked fat leaking from everywhere and feel like the walking dead ca ever see my self feeling normal again when did you feel like you were somewhat back to your normal self mine was 10 weeks hang in there deleted right around my son first birthday was when started feeling pretty again was able to fit into my prepregnancy clothes and did need to wear nursing pads anymore even though we were still breast feeding will say that it took me long time because for the first months of my son life my husband was overseas so was doing it all myself that left little time for myself and when did have time working out was the last thing on my mind am still stretch marked on weird places but many have faded and just become part of me you can try scar reducing creams like maderma to help them fade faster my advice is try to get out and about with your little one go on lots of walks and eat healthy the pounds will come off and the stretch marks will fade it is all temporary errghhh you nearly made me teary stupid hormones yeah on my own as well so somedays ca even find time to have shower so stink as well hah the stretch marks are just everywhere and its bringing me down so much always used to be so skinny just want my old body back around the month mark is when felt physically myself again for me it was all the squishy internal stuff after that time things settled and firmed up so did feel like my intestines were moving around anymore months later and while ve not lost all the baby fat still got 20lbs to go out of 60 the stretch marks are fading and feel like myself felt good at weeks to go do all kinds of things but when did go do them realized did last long at about weeks the mess in my downstairs mix up was gone got my first pms early at weeks yay about weeks after could do the things used to like exercise as did before and go out gardening without wanting to die 20 minutes in at around months boobs stopped leaking at months they did even hurt anymore when they were full if somethings weird just ask the doc but sounds like your well on your way to getting back in the game it took you months to get here sometimes can take that much or more to bounce back everyones different my body felt pretty much back to normal around months but did truly feel like me again until we stopped breastfeeding after year using my body as source of food was just odd know it seems like things will never be back to normal but they will hang in there deleted my baby is months and just now starting to feel like me the post baby body odor is the worst do use deodorant because of the scary chemicals in them but have found that lemon juice under your arms works really well to eliminate odor just keep lemon slice in marked baggie in the fridge and apply as needed works for me edited to say dang apparently there are people who are so passionately against lemon juice in this context that they felt the need to downvote me months before my boobs settled down months after each pregnancy to feel truly back to normal physically and until finished breastfeeding with my first until my libido came back still bfing though so hoping it goes the same way it gets better once you get into bit of routine and feel comfortable with all the changes to your lifestyle you ll feel better again do rush it or let anyone else rush you for at least year can relate to the disdain and worry about your body geez ca we all having started out skinny and having history of eating disorder prior to becoming pregnant honestly though my body went back to *very near* normal have one bd stretch mark that will never look right above my belly button so it kind of like crepe paper and really any additional curviness ve attained is good thing for me back to my pre preg weight now 10 months out of my 2nd pregnancy my hips were wide for months and think they re still bit wider than they were initially but as said nothing but good for straight hipped me would say with my first it was months after was working really hard to lose all the weight was down even more then before pregnancy still had small pouch and stretch marks but it was so nice very nice then got pregnant again short lived but enjoyed it now my second is 28 months old getting there again like others had said it takes months to get there it will take just as much time if it helps with time your sagging can go away with exercise not completely for some but you will see difference the stretch marks will fade they will always be there but not as noticeable it small price to have your bundle of joy even though some days you feel like pulling your hair out totally worth it hang in there all that matters if you eat healthy and stay healthy for your little one now months but honestly there are few things that will never go back like couple stretch marks on my breasts and my belly button piercing is pretty much ruined now im starting to accept it more now but some days it gets me down even year later took me until my daughter turned one mainly because that is when stopped breastfeeding so kinda felt like my body was mine again plus by that age the baby gets little easier more predictable and my life kinda settled in and could re focus on myself started feeling normal albeit bit chubby still at around months pp yup one year the fog lifted and remembered myself when stopped leaking and bleeding about to 10 weeks my son is now months old and ve felt normal for couple months now hang in there got to my memory it took about 10 weeks to hit my pre pregnancy clothes which really had me pancking until just before returned to work but my shape has been different since my sex drive was lower until about year after stopped breastfeeding child sleep and shower when the baby sleeps junior can hang out and watch you fold laundry the rest of the house can go to hell until you are sleeping never not really have been pregnant or breastfeeding for more than three solid years and have at least two more to go before my hormones are finally reset to normal but the first three months after now and that is your new normal three weeks to fit into my pre pregnancy jeans three months until looked mostly normal still bit soft everywhere four months until my broken tailbone healed and could before that in survival mode but then feel that turn corner things become easier the kid starts to be bit more human routines are usually established life just becomes easier to me it has less to do with what my body looks like and more of my day feeling manageable and enjoyable deleted months to feel mostly normal physically year to feel like was back to my old self sorry to say you ll never weeks after my section would have been able to even imagine doing that the first months are hard the teacher at my newborn care class said to think of them as the 4th trimester do worry about anything but yourself and your baby during this time get to know your little guy get as much rest as you can shower when you can eat healthy foods and get little exercise if you can your body has been through something completely altering it may never look exactly the same but you will be able to lose the weight if you can get into good routine with your baby you ll eventually find time to do the things you used to do to stay fit like eating well and exercising and you will lose the weight it will probably be couple more months before you and your baby get into routine where you can find time to
